product.name: Puma Shoes
product.description: The Air Jordan 1 Mid Shoe is inspired by the first AJ1, offering fans of Jordan retros a chance to follow in the footsteps of greatness. Fresh colour trims the clean, classic materials, injecting some newness into the familiar design.
product.about: Celebrate the beauty of our planet with this adidas Stan Smith shoe. Created in collaboration with HER Studio London, this iconic sneaker features a heavenly floral print. Crafted from recycled materials, it has a sleek, sleek synthetic upper that looks like leather. A classic shoe that reduces waste. And to go even further: this product is designed with Primegreen, a series of high performance recycled materials. 50% of the upper is made from recycled materials. No virgin polyester.

user_review.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 12, 2021
user_review.review_descripion: I love shoes.com. Their products are affordable but with good quality. Fast shipping and great products. Recommended 5 thumbs up

user_review.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on June 12, 2020
user_review.review_descripion: I would stay away from ordering shoes from this website strictly because of their return policy. Not only do they give you just 14 days to return your purchase for a full refund vs. a store credit you'll only have 5 days to ship the product back once you receive the return authorization number (which I applied for only two days after receiving my boots).

user_review.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on March 12, 2021
user_review.review_descripion: I’ve bought several Easy Spirit slip on shoes from this site. They do have limited widths that I need. Twice I’ve received wrong width. But just now I tried to order four pair of Traveltime shoes. I’m told they cannot ship to THIS country???? (USA) I tried four different times to order and was given the same message

user_review.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 12, 2021
user_review.review_descripion: I have purchased three pair of Orthofeet shoes , I have a torn Achilles tendon on one foot and frontal tendon tear also on the opposite foot …Need to wear an Arizona brace on my right foot ,don’t know about the left yet ! These shoes are accommodating the brace nicely ! I have neuropathy , plantar fasciitis ,heel Spurs etc.Best shoes I’ve ever worn …And they are an affordable price ! Thank You Orthofeet …

user_review.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on June 12, 2020
user_review.review_descripion: These shoes are NOT true to size!(At least a half size smaller than sized)Heavy, cumbersome and not feminine-looking at all.I sent them back immediately.Please look elsewhere-- I definitely am

user_review.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on March 12, 2021
user_review.review_descripion: Excellent foot wear! Standing on concrete all day requires proper arch support and comfort. Orthofeet foot wear provides me with such relief. Thank you, Orthofeet, for providing a durable, comfortable, and arch supporting foot wear that I can depend on!
